channel.title: Posts on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.title: How to datapasta
item.description: I was recently told about datapasta, a jewel of a package that provides RStudio addins and functions to freely copy-paste data in and out of a source editor, formatted for immediate use. Resources How to https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/datapasta/vignettes/how-to-datapasta.html GitHub https://github.com/MilesMcBain/datapasta MetaCRAN https://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/datapasta

item.title: iSEE workshop at Bioc2019!
item.description: The iSEE package will be presented as a workshop at the Bioconductor 2019 conference in New York City! What to expect Charlotte Soneson and I will be conducting a workshop that demonstrates the many features and usages of the iSEE package. With the help of the iSEE team, we have prepared a vignette demonstrating the integration of the package functionality into an example single-cell RNA-sequencing workflow. The workshop was designed to cater for the needs of users at all levels of familiarity with R and the Bioconductor project.
